item.title: Berit Anderson Tutoring
item.dc:creator: Brent Lagerman
item.description:

The post Berit Anderson Tutoring appeared first on mimoYmima.
item.content:encoded:
Berit has quickly become one of our favorite clients. She put a lot of faith in us and asked us to create something original & artistic (a dream come true). Her business is tutoring for high school students (think SAT, LSAT…) The tagline she came up with: ‘fireflies are crepuscular’, is an example of a device she uses to help kids remember complicated vocab words. It was also the inspiration for her visual identity:

The post Berit Anderson Tutoring appeared first on mimoYmima.
